name: Google Dino Advance
description:
Google Dino Advance is a recreation of the google dinosaur game for Nintendo's 2001 handheld: the Gameboy Advance. This is an attempted 1-to-1 translation of the original.

Playing
The ROM can be opened in any Gameboy Advance emulator of your choosing, or a flash cart.  
Up on the D-pad and the A button make Dino jump, down on the D-pad crouches or speeds up Dino's fall.

Source
The source is available here.

Notes
Referenced the original chromium source heavily.
Game has been balanced to run as the actual game plays in a 240p sized window. The max speed was scaled down the same way the starting speed is scaled down in the original game.
All game art and game design is property of Google :)
